text: Rogério Dutra Silva was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Santiago Giraldo won the title after defeating Uladzimir Ignatik 6–4, 3–6, 7–6(7–2) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw 2016 Men's Singles Advantage Cars Prague Open - Singles
title: 2016 Advantage Cars Prague Open – Men's Singles
